title: Add edit existing node keybinding (e or i)
description: In nav mode, pressing 'e' or 'i' should enter edit mode for the currently selected node's text.

title: Support markdown formatting in nodes
description: Render markdown formatting in node text (bold, italic, code, etc).

title: Fix text truncation in edit mode display
description: Text appears truncated in the visual display during editing. Full text saves correctly but user can't see what they're typing.

title: Add delete node (d in nav mode)
description: Press 'd' to delete the current node and all its children.

title: Add colors to markers
description: Add color coding to the mindmap markers/connectors for better visual hierarchy.

title: Add yank subtree (y in nav mode)
description: Press 'y' to yank (copy) the current node and all its descendants as outline format to clipboard.

title: Clean up mm/examples/simple.mm test data
description: The simple.mm example file contains test/debug data (dash entries, "hello" nodes) instead of a clean example.

title: Add move subtree (modifier + arrows)
description: Use Shift+Arrow or Alt+Arrow to move the current node (with all its children) around the tree. Up/Down moves among siblings, Left/Right changes parent.

title: Add focus subtree (f in nav mode)
description: Press 'f' to focus on current subtree - hide everything except this node and its descendants. Show hint that there are hidden parents to the left. Press 'f' again or Esc to unfocus.

title: Fix Tab in edit mode - should create child and continue editing
description: Tab in edit mode should: save current text, exit edit mode, create a child node, and enter edit mode in that child. Currently not working as expected.

title: Fix mm/ lint script - tsgo package doesn't exist
description: The lint script in mm/package.json runs `bunx tsgo --noEmit` but tsgo doesn't exist on npm (404 error). Need to replace with working TypeScript checker - either `tsc --noEmit` or `bun --bun check`.

title: Fix Backspace/Delete in edit mode
description: Backspace and Delete keys have no effect in edit mode. Should delete characters.

title: Add undo/redo support
description: Support undo (u or Ctrl+z) and redo (Ctrl+r or Ctrl+y) for all editing operations.

title: Add paste subtree (p in nav mode)
description: Press 'p' to paste yanked/copied outline as children under current node.

title: Fix React duplicate key warning in mm/ renderer
description: Console warning: "Encountered two children with the same key". Keys in the mindmap renderer are not unique, causing React reconciliation issues.

title: Add collapse subtree (Space in nav mode)
description: Space in nav mode toggles collapse of all children. Collapsed node shows (+N) where N is the count of hidden descendants.
